name: OneTask V2 - December 2025
description:
Added Functions:
1. Added Auto-Priority Tools (Low->Medium Promotion based on Customizable Rules)
2. Added the ability to schedule future tasks
3. Changed appearance of adding tasks
4. Added a overdue task warning
5. Bug Fixes (Button Functionality Bug - Account Creation, Profile Editing, Project/Account Deletion Bug, Light Mode Readability Issue)
